General.Name: Hynar Water Group Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Hynar Water Group Co., Ltd. provides industrial wastewater treatment and water supply services in China. The company offers investment, design, construction, and operation services for industrial parks, and industrial sewage treatment plants and related supporting pipe networks, as well as drinking water supply facilities. It also provides sludge treatment and disposal system solutions. In addition, the company offers industrial wastewater treatment services for the pharmaceutical, printing and dyeing, chemical, pesticide, food processing, and other industries. Hynar Water Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: 3033 Water Group Nanshan Building, Shenzhen, China, 518052
